definition: the state of impairing the quality or reducing the value of something, to lower in value by increasing the base-metal content
details:
noun
- the state of impairing the quality or reducing the value of something
= synonyms: admixture
- a mixture containing two or more metallic elements or metallic and nonmetallic elements usually fused together or dissolving into each other when molten
= example: a mixture containing two or more metallic elements or metallic and nonmetallic elements usually fused together or dissolving into each other when molten
= synonyms: metal
verb
- to lower in value by increasing the base-metal content
= example: to lower in value by increasing the base-metal content
= synonyms: debase
